title: Diastic Machine
description: The Diastic technique is a methodology and algorithm for generating found poetry from a source text. It was developed and used by poet / artist Jackson Mac Low. In this challenge, I generate diastic poems using p5.js.

codeExamples.title: Diastic Machine
codeExamples.description: A procedural poetry generation that uses a seed word or phrase

links.title: Jackson Mac Low on Wikipedia
